When I play the movie.I see two screens or should I say a single screen but in two parts and playing the same movie side by side on both parts.Could you please tell me why this is so and how do I correct it.

Wow..so apparently nobody knows how to read. Do yourselves a favor and look at the torrent name...I mean seriously people, basic reading comprehension was covered in grade 1, this shouldn't be a problem anymore.
This is SBS i.e. side by side version,  only meant for 3D TVs or 3D ready monitors....Don't download SBS versions if u do not have 3D compatible monitors/TVs..
